widget.header: Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

config.title: Lenny Esquivel
config.description: Hi! I am Lenny. I like listening to music, playing the guitar, the bass, and the drums, too. My favorite bands are Radiohead, Pink Floyd, Led Zeppelin, Tame Impala, and The National. I love to compose music in my free time, and I also

config: play video games from time to time. My favorite video games are Overwatch and Rocket League.
